</body> 
***чреватый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чреватый.html>чрева́тый</a> (14388)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črévo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-а́тый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-átyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чреватый.html>чрева́тый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črevátyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:fraught.html>fraught</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a>); <a href = vnd.unilang:pregnant.html>pregnant</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́во</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črévo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>чре<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чрев-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ат</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="устаревшее">устар.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:беременный.html>бере́менный</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:беременный.html>бере́менная</a></i>), <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:состояние.html>состоя́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:беременность.html>бере́менности</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:ежели.html>Е́жели</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:девка.html>де́вкою</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пребыть.html>пребу́дет</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> очреватит <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>её</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уговор.html>угово́ром</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чтоб.html>чтоб</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ней</a> женитца, <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сей.html>сие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:содержать.html>содержа́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***чрево.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́во</a> (14893)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">чрѣво</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črěvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*červo</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:doublet.html>Doublet</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">черёво</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čerjóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:inherit.html>inherited</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́во</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črévo</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́ва</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́ва</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрево.html>чре́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:anatomy.html>anatomy</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:belly.html>belly</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:womb.html>womb</a></li>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:живот.html>живо́т</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">živót</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:брюхо.html>брю́хо</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">brjúxo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пузо.html>пу́зо</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">púzo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:утроба.html>утро́ба</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">utróba</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нутро.html>нутро́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nutró</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чрева́тость</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevátostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревовеща́тель</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevoveščátelʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревовещательница</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevoveščatelʹnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревоуго́дие</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevougódije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревоугодничество</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevougodničestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревоуго́дник</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevougódnik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревоугодница</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevougodnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чреватый.html>чрева́тый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevátyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревоуго́дничать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevougódničatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">чревовещать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črevoveščatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чреватый.html>чрева́то</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">čreváto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>чре́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чрев-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a> (2773)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайный.html>чрезвыча́йный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črezvyčájnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črezvyčájno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:extremely.html>extremely</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:utterly.html>utterly</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:высший.html>вы́сшей</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> výsšej stépeni</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:очень.html>о́чень</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óčenʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:весьма.html>весьма́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vesʹmá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:необычайный.html>необыча́йно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">neobyčájno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:крайний.html>кра́йне</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krájne</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črezvyčájno</span>)

<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:neuter.html>neuter</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайный.html>чрезвыча́йный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črezvyčájnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>чрез<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>вы</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:чай.html>ча́й</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, определительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:мера.html>ме́ры</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чрезвычайн-</b>; суффикс: <b>-о</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>нареч.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайный.html>чрезвыча́йный</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:высший.html>вы́сшей</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:очень.html>о́чень</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:застенчивый.html>Засте́нчивый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:скромный.html>скро́мный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ответ.html>отве́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гвардеец.html>гварде́йца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нравиться.html>нра́вился</a> Марфе Андревне <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9B%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D0%BC%D1%91%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Лесков, Николай Семёнович">Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>Леско́в</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:старый.html>Ста́рые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>го́ды</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:село.html>селе́</a> Плодомасове», <span class="example-date">1869</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>чрез<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>вы</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:чай.html>ча́й</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>чрезвыча́йнее.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чрезвычайн-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***чрезмерно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рно</a> (12345)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črezmérnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črezmérno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>excessively (<a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:excessive.html>excessive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:degree.html>degree</a>)</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:избыточный.html>избы́точно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">izbytočno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">črezvyčájno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">črezmérno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:neuter.html>neuter</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črezmérnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>чрез<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:мера.html>ме́р</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, определительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чрез-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мер-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-н-о</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>нареч.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рный</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:переходить.html>переходя́</a> какую-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:норма.html>но́рму</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:граница.html>грани́цу</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:выше.html>вы́ше</a> какого-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:предел.html>преде́ла</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:сверх.html>сверх</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мера.html>ме́ры</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезвычайно.html>чрезвыча́йно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:слишком.html>сли́шком</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>

***чрезмерный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чрезмерный.html>чрезме́рный</a> (7719)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">чрез-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črez-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мера.html>ме́ра</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">méra</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.

***чресла.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чресла.html>чре́сла</a> (32416)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">чрѣсла</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">črěsla</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*čerslo</i>. Displaced <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:native.html>native</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">че́ресла</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čéresla</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

Зализняка) |  ед. ч. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>.

class="extiw" title="w:Набоков, Владимир Владимирович"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. </ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

</body> 
***чтение.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́ние</a> (2933)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">чт-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čt-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-е́ние</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-énije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čténije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:read.html>reading</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:process.html>process</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:interpret.html>interpreting</a> written <a href = vnd.unilang:language.html>language</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:read.html>reading</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:legislature.html>legislature</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:several.html>several</a> stages <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bill.html>bill</a> passes <a href = vnd.unilang:through.html>through</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:before.html>before</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:become.html>becoming</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:law.html>law</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:читать.html>чита́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">čitátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>чте́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

Переложение <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отечественный.html>оте́чественный</a> Сергея Есина, <span class="example-date">2008</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

***чтец.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтец</a> (31095)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">чт-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čt-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-е́ц</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-éc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтец</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čtec</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтеца́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтецы́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтецо́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>elocutionist, <a href = vnd.unilang:reader.html>reader</a></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чтец.html>чтец</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ец</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

Вигель</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:записка.html>Запи́ски</a>», <span class="example-date">1850—1860<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">— <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <li><a href = vnd.unilang:артист.html>артист</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:профессиональный.html>профессиона́льно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:заниматься.html>занимающийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:художественный.html>худо́жественным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чтение.html>чте́нием</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вслух.html>вслух</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Саша Медведев, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***чтиво.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чтиво.html>чти́во</a> (31450)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">чт-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>For</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:честь.html>чти́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ив</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***чтить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чтить.html>чти́ть</a> (14021)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*čьstiti</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*(<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a>)kʷit-tis</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="uk">чтити</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="uk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čtyty</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Polish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:polish.html>Polish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="pl">czcić</i>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтить.html>чти́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čtitʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:почтить.html>почти́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:honor.html>honor</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:revere.html>revere</a></li></ol>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:почитать.html>почита́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">počitátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:почесть.html>поче́сть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">počéstʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чтить.html>чти́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4bX^.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:почтить.html>почти́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b> |  суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b> |  глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>. <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:чувствовать.html>чу́вствовать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:проявлять.html>проявля́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> кому-либо, чему-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:глубокий.html>глубо́кое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уважение.html>уваже́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:почтение.html>почте́ние</a>; ***что.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> (112)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*čьto</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*kʷid</i>, <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*kʷis</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction"><a href = vnd.unilang:conjunction.html>Conjunction</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">što</span>) <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:invariable.html>invariable</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:думать.html>ду́маю</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дом.html>до́ма</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> dúmaju, <b>što</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> dóma.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:think.html>think</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>he</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:home.html>home</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun"><a href = vnd.unilang:pronoun.html>Pronoun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">što</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:interrogative.html>interrogative</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:what.html>what</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>Что</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a>?</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Što</b> éto?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:what.html>What</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a>?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́ет</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значить.html>зна́чит</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>On</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> znájet, <b>što</b> éto znáčit.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>He</a> doesn’<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:know.html>know</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:what.html>what</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>means</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">nonstandard<span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:relative.html>relative</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:which.html>which</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́га</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>столе́</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">kníga, <b>što</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:na.html>na</a> stolé</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>book</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:table.html>table</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<div class="derivedterms CategoryTreeTag" data-ct-mode="20" data-ct-options="{quot;modequot;:20,quot;hideprefixquot;:10,quot;showcountquot;:true,quot;namespacesquot;:false,quot;notranslationsquot;:false}"><div class="CategoryTreeSection"><div class="CategoryTreeItem"><span class="CategoryTreeBullet"><span class="CategoryTreeToggle" data-ct-title="Russian_terms_derived_from_the_PIE_root_*kʷe-" data-ct-state="collapsed">►</span> </span> <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a> derived <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pie.html>Pie</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:root.html>root</a> *kʷe-‎ <span title="Contains 0 subcategories, 11 pages, and 0 files" dir="ltr">(0 <a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>, 11 <a href = vnd.unilang:e.html>e</a>)</span></div><div class="CategoryTreeChildren" style="display:none"></div></div></div>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b>
</p><p>Местоимение.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмой</a> винительного <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ются</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́ги</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:обо.html>обо́</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:подо.html>подо</a></i> (<a href = vnd.unilang:вместо.html>вме́сто</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a></i>).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цель.html>це́лью</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:разграничение.html>разграниче́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> местоимения <i><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></i>, присоединяющего <a href = vnd.unilang:придаточный.html>прида́точное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предложение.html>предложе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> изъяснительным <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нием</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:союз.html>сою́за</a> <i><a href="что_(союз)"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> местоимения <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поставленный.html>поста́влен</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знак.html>знак</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ния</a>: <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">…<a href = vnd.unilang:рассказать.html>Рассказа́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отовсюду.html>отовсю́ду</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>меня́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:веселье.html>весе́льем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:веять.html>ве́ет</a>, / <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>Что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сам.html>сам</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что́</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бу́ду</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:петь.html>Петь</a>, ― <a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:только.html>то́лько</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:песня.html>пе́сня</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зреть.html>зре́ет</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A4%D0%B5%D1%82,_%D0%90%D1%84%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%90%D1%84%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Фет, Афанасий Афанасьевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Фет</a><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> (<a href="CITEREFПравила,_2013"><a href = vnd.unilang:правило.html>Правила</a>, 2013↓</a>).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> просторечный <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> именительного <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> винительного <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́</a>: <i>чё</i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-что-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:косвенный.html>ко́свенных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ния</a> <b>-его</b>, <b>-ему</b>, <b>-ем</b>, <b>-ём</b>. <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>Други́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:специалист.html>специали́сты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выделять.html>выделя́ют</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a> <b>-о</b> (<a href="CITEREFРГ-80">РГ-80↓</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <b>-то</b> (<a href="CITEREFСичинава,_2013">Сичинава, 2013↓</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> именительном <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> винительном <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́х</a>.
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:без.html>без</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:исключение.html>исключе́ния</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:очень.html>о́чень</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:многое.html>мно́гое</a> <sup id="cite_ref-25" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-25"> | 1 7 | </a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-26" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-26"> | 1 7 | </a></sup><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-27" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-27"> | 1 7 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-28" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-28"> | ▼1 7 | </a></sup></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:риторический.html>ритори́ческих</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вопрос.html>вопро́сах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:восклицательный.html>восклица́тельных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предложение.html>предложе́ниях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отрицание.html>отрица́нием</a>) <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:неизвестный.html>неизве́стный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорящий.html>говоря́щему</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:безразлично.html>безразли́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:какой.html>како́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:объект.html>объект</a>; что-нибудь, что-то <sup id="cite_ref-29" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-29"> | 1 8 | </a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-30"> | 1 8 | </a></sup><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-31" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-31"> | 1 8 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-32" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-32"> | ▼1 8 | </a></sup></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:спросить.html>Спроси́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>самом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>де́ле</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:союз.html>Сою́з</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b>; суффикс: <b>-о</b> [<a href = vnd.unilang:бусы.html>Бу́с</a>, 2016].
</p>

<li id="cite_note-45"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="cite_ref-45">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:раз.html>раз</a></span>

<li id="cite_note-49"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><a href="cite_ref-49">↑</a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:только.html>то́лько</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_3"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:частица.html>Части́ца</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> просторечный <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:написание.html>написа́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:произношение.html>произноше́ния</a>: <i>чё</i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чт-</b>; суффикс: <b>-о</b> [<a href = vnd.unilang:бусы.html>Бу́с</a>, 2016].
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вопросительный.html>вопроси́тельный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отклик.html>о́тклик</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ответ.html>отве́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обращение.html>обраще́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> переспросе нерасслышанного <sup id="cite_ref-53" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-53"> | 3 1 | </a></sup><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-54" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-54"> | 3 1 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-55" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-55"> | 3 1 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-56" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-56"> | ▼3 1 | </a></sup></span> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

[Забелина:] <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;">Что-о</span>? <a href = vnd.unilang:облако.html>О́блако</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a>… <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:штаны.html>штана́х</a>? <a href = vnd.unilang:неужели.html>Неуже́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́гут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>таки́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стихи.html>стихи</a>? <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Н. <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чтоб.html>чтоб</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:союз.html>Сою́з</a>; неизменяемое.

Р. Мамышев</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:злосчастный.html>Злосча́стный</a>», <span class="example-date">1807</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

***чтобы.html

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">što</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction"><a href = vnd.unilang:conjunction.html>Conjunction</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтобы.html>что́бы</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">štóby</span>) <i>(+ <a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tense.html>tense</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:infinitive.html>infinitive</a>)</i>
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a>...<a href = vnd.unilang:should.html>should</a> (<span class="use-with-mention">indicates <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:subjunctive.html>subjunctive</a></span>)</li>

***чтущий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:честь.html>чту́щий</a> (1170)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:честь.html>чту́щий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čtúščij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:честь.html>честь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čestʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:честь.html>чту́щий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čtúščij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чтить.html>чти́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čtitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

Жуковский</a>, «<a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0_(%D0%96%D1%83%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9)" class="extiw" title="s:Светлана (Жуковский)">Светлана</a>», <span class="example-date">1812</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***чуб.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чуб</a> (14131)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*čubъ</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чуб</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čub</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чу́ба</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чубы́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чубо́в</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>diminutive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чубчик.html>чу́бчик</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:forelock.html>forelock</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чуб.html>чуб</a></b>

***чувак.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чува́к</a> (17970)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:possibly.html>Possibly</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romani_language" class="extiw" title="w:Romani language">Romani</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:origin.html>origin</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_language" class="extiw" title="w:English language"><a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en">chav</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чува́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čuvák</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чувака́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чуваки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чувако́в</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́ха</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:dude.html>dude</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:guy.html>guy</a>, dawg</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:парень.html>па́рень</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">párenʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мужик.html>мужи́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mužík</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">кент</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:kent.html>kent</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чу.html>чу</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-чув-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ак</b>.
</p>

***чувиха.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́ха</a> (31891)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">чув(а́к)</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">čuv(ák)</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́ха</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-íxa</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́ха</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">čuvíxa</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́хи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́хи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувиха.html>чуви́х</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:masculine.html>masculine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чувак.html>чува́к</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:girl.html>girl</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:chick.html>chick</a>, dudette</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:чу.html>чу</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ха.html>ха</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="криминальное">крим.</span> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="жаргонизм(ы)">жарг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:проститутка.html>проститу́тка</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
